DOC.brief_summary: A double blind , control , randomize , single site clinical trial 2 parallel group ( Low protein formula =LoF High protein formula =HiF ) breastfeed group ( BF ) reference birth 1 year age follow period 1 year 5 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Level Dietary Protein Infant Hormonal Profile Body Composition
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective clinical trial show infant take ( birth ) either formula low protein content ( LoF ) breast milk IGF-1 level , 4 month , 25 % low IGF-1 measure infant receive high protein content formula ( HiF ) . The secondary objective : The hormonal profile ; Fat mass ( FM ) gain Lean mass ( LM ) ; metabolomics aminogramm first year life . Subjects include study duration 5 year . From birth 4 month exclusively feed BF FF . From 4 month age start diversification , maintain starter formula 12 month ( BF group receive LoF ) . Subjects follow 5 year age .
DOC.criteria: . Healthy newborn infant Full term infant ( = 37 week gestation ; = 42 week gestation ) Birth weight = 2500 g < 4200 g Singleton birth Infant = 7 day age time enrollment For BF group : The infant 's mother elect exclusively breastfeed baby , enrollment 4 month age For FF group : The infant 's mother elect exclusively formula feed baby , enrollment 4 month age Having obtain his/her his/her legal representative 's consent Newborn whose mother 's BMI normal ( < 20 = 25 ) start pregnancy Newborn whose mother develop gestational diabetes pregnancy Newborn whose mother diabetes type1 type2 Newborn whose mother smoke > 5 cigarette / day pregnancy Newborn whose mother drug dependence pregnancy Newborn whose mother chronic infectious disease Newborn whose parent / caregiver expect comply treatment Newborn currently participate another clinical trial
